definition: to yearn for/to look forward to
surname Xiang
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
old variant of 往[wang3]
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: Ever since she was six years old, Loryn has yearned to visit India.
sentences.chinese: 从六岁开始，洛恩就向往游览印度。

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大学，一所许多人都向往的大学。

sentences.english: So many foreigners aspire to Chinese culture because of the prosperities in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我们国家欣欣向荣，好多外国人都十分向往中国文化。

sentences.english: His heart desired this, so he decided to go to Shewei country and learn Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 他心中十分向往，便想去舍卫国观光并修学佛法。

sentences.english: A few years passed and I found myself yearning again to learn how to hula dance.
sentences.chinese: 几年过去了，我发现自己再次向往学习如何跳草裙舞。

sentences.english: See autumn cloud, I yearn for the vast clear sky vast.
sentences.chinese: 看秋云，我向往这浩渺明净的蓝天的广博。

sentences.english: It's at this time of year that I start to pine for the snow-topped mountains.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候我就开始向往覆盖着白雪的高山。

sentences.english: Still do not understand the joys of life, only know that longing and yearning for innocently.
sentences.chinese: 还不懂得生活的甘苦，只知道傻傻地憧憬和向往。

sentences.english: Think it's very luxurious, I long for, there are pictures of it here?
sentences.chinese: 想想它也是非常的豪华，令我向往，有它的照片吗？

sentences.english: LOGO - A grade - school art teacher. She is just the kind of teacher that you wish you had when you were young.
sentences.chinese: 一位小学美术教师，她就是那种你年轻时向往的教师。

sentences.english: Yearning for a long enrapture you yesterday and the longing for a beautiful future.
sentences.chinese: 思念是对你昨日悠长的沉缅和对未来美好的向往。

sentences.english: The idea that a 2 minutes orgasm is desirable is absolutely ridiculous.
sentences.chinese: 2分钟就来高潮是令人向往的，也是绝对荒谬的。

sentences.english: Yet lately, my bedroom has hardly become the haven I hoped for.
sentences.chinese: 但是近来，我的卧室却再也变不成我向往的天堂了。

sentences.english: I hope you won't forget me, cause we've shared a lot dreams.
sentences.chinese: 希望你们不要忘了我，因为我们曾有过那么多的向往。

sentences.english: Therefore, the success, became the people one kind luxuriously to yearn for.
sentences.chinese: 于是，成功，就成了人们一种奢侈的向往了。

sentences.english: Bonnie was living the life for which she had always hoped.
sentences.chinese: 邦妮过着多年来一直向往过的生活。

definition: to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
to thirst for/to long for
to be fascinated/to be rapt/to long for/to dream of
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to love ardently/to adore
to hope/to expect/expectation(s)
to aspire
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
delusion/fantasy
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
beautiful/fine
(fig.) to dream of/dream
to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
to envy/to admire
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
